<<<<<<< HEAD
Sam. Ld. Bp. of Oxon, his celebrated reasons for abrogating the test and notions of idolatry, answered by Samuel, Arch-Deacon of Canterbury. Phillips, John, 1631-1706.
The third edition.
[2], 22 p.
[s.n.], London printed : 1688.
"Samuel Parker was Archdeacon of Canterbury in 1686 when he became Bishop of Oxford"--NUC pre-1956 imprints. Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Phillips. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
=======
